1403540.name: Street Fighter V: Champion Edition Original Soundtrack
1403540.description:
This soundtrack includes 9 character themes recently added to Street Fighter V: Champion Edition featuring Cody, G, Sagat, Kage, Poison, Lucia, E. Honda, Gill and Seth.

Enjoy 17 additional stage themes and tracks from Tournament Mode, making it a robust lineup of 28 tracks.

The 116+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
